ygData.subject: Re: Goings on
ygData.msgSnippet: Vulois Bulois was about to enter the tunnel when he heard Battera respond. He rushed back quickly to answer her. What I want you to do? Wait there for now.

Vulois

Bulois was about to enter the tunnel when he heard Battera respond. 
He rushed back quickly to answer her.

"What I want you to do? Wait there for now. When Cybershark returns, 
go with him and find Megatron. Talk to him about the talks. But I 
have to go. One of our new membres who you haven't met yet is lost in 
the tunnels. I have to go find him. If you need to talk to me, leave 
a message with Windrazor and Terradive here."

Vulois ran back down the tunnel, looking for Child.

(Has anyone seen Shomin?)
______________________________________________________________________
Brix

Brix got up and looked at Ramulus.

"Thanks buddy. Now hold tight." Brix checked the timer: 4 minutes 
left before the shuttle leaves. Time to hurt this guy.

Brix went to Beast Mode, his gigantic centaur, with the torso of a 
human and the body of a horse. His palms opened up and shot laser 
beams at Gekkidama's feet. Gekkidama rolled out of the way, got up, 
and started dancing. Brix than shot one in his chest, knocking him 
back down. Brix went over and picked him up, and placed his plam 
against the back of his neck.

"You know Gekkidama, the penalty for treason is death."

"So it maybe. But in my law, since I rule this moon now, is that 
abandonement of an officer is a lifetime imprisonment. Have fun, 
Brix."

Gekkidama quickly lifet his hand and shot three grenades(it's a built 
in one) towards the shuttle. Brix fired his palm, ending the life of 
the psycotic Maximal warrior Gekkidama. But they had a new peril.

"Ramulus! Use your gun to deflect those shots! Quick!"
